mapper.sql: SELECT product.id, product.addtime, product.updatetime, product_name, product_presentation FROM
mapper.select: SELECT id, product_name FROM product ORDER BY addtime
product JOIN product_member ON product.id = product_member.product_id WHERE user_id = #{0}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (id, addtime, updatetime, product_name, product_presentation) VALUES (#{id}, #{addTime}, #{updateTime}, #{productName}, #{productPresentation})
INSERT INTO product_member (id, addtime, updatetime, product_id, user_id) VALUES (#{id}, #{addTime}, #{updateTime}, #{productId}, #{userId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM product_member WHERE product_id = #{productId} AND user_id = #{userId}
